channel.title: Rune-Elevation 742 - Bosses, MiniGames, All 25 Skill Working and Much More!
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/a2q25i.jpg[/img]
[SIZE=5][B][U][COLOR="#FF0000"]Links:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B][/U] [URL=http://"http://rune-elevation.zzl.org"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://rune-elevation.zzl.org/webclient.html"]Webclient[/URL] [URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/u/95699771/Rune-Elevation.jar"]Download Client[/URL] [URL=http://"http://rune-elevation.zzl.org/vote.php"]Vote4Spins[/URL]
[SIZE=5][B][U][COLOR="#FF0000"]Features:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B][/U] [COLOR="#00FF00"] -100% Shops fixed price and etc. -Vote4Spins -100% SOF added (All working Rarities) -All Dominion Glove Specials Work (Golitath, Spellcasters and Swifts With Shop) -Full GWD (Including Nex and Nex Drops the new Nex Boots and Gloves!) -KING BLACK DRAGON JUST LIKE RUNESCAPE (You will love this feature) -Perfect Theiving, with delay and sides. -New Saradomin Amulets (Whisper, Murmur and Hiss) and Godwars Items (Bandos helmet, Bandos Gloves, Bandos Boots, Armadyl's Crossbow, Armadyl's Buckler -Ranks: Mod, Admin, Owner, Donator, Extreme Donator and Helper (With all unique crowns!) -Revenants and Glacors with working Drops (Pvp Armours for Revs) (Glaivens, Steadfasts and Ragefire Boots for Glacors) -Custom loyalty program with loyalty shop (Every 30 minutes players get a notification in the chat box that they receive 250 Loyalty points.) -Custom Quest Tab, Skills tele, monster tele, etc. -All 735+ Monsters such as Nex, Godwars, All of that good stuff -Home is at Warriors Guild -Pvp System with Pvp shop -A completely CUSTOM Ganodermic shop - all working auras including supreme's - eco base - eco pricing - flaming skulls - specs for all items the should have - Lucky item specs and bonuses - Switching is near perfect - All Spellbooks are accessible via Commands and altars - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP - Auras are all complete - 100% Godwars - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Switching better than RS - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar) - All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! - Quick Chat 100% - music everyone knows that - donorzones - All new 742 armours with bonuses - Bosses are upgraded to new looks - Jad waves maxed out to 65 - Armours are almost all update to date with bonuses and stats - Each armour that need requirements on RS is same on here now
[/COLOR]
[SPOILER=Media]Zombies Minigame [IMG]http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i430/clawzownu/zombies_zps1110973f.png[/img] Zamorak [IMG]http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i430/clawzownu/zamorak_zpsbe7ec9db.png[/img] Troll Invasion Minigame [IMG]http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i430/clawzownu/summonpouch_zps3f8f8914.png[/img] Soul Wars Minigame [IMG]http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i430/clawzownu/soulwars_zps546c9bd9.png[/img] Saradomin [IMG]http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i430/clawzownu/saradomin_zps19ccd933.png[/img] Runecrafting [IMG]http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i430/clawzownu/mining_zpsf721b504.png[/img] Loyalty Points with Shop [IMG]http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i430/clawzownu/loyalty1_zpsb679f9a0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i430/clawzownu/loyalty2_zps778bea80.png[/img] King Black Dragon [IMG]http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i430/clawzownu/kbd_zpsd6abd305.png[/img] Jadinko Dungeon [IMG]http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i430/clawzownu/jadinko_zps48c454e9.png[/img] Hunting [IMG]http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i430/clawzownu/hunting_zps545260a9.png[/img] Glacors [IMG]http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i430/clawzownu/glacor_zpsc7d67dab.png[/img] Ganos [IMG]http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i430/clawzownu/ganos_zpsa4989073.png[/img] Fishing [IMG]http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i430/clawzownu/fishing_zps499fcb36.png[/img] Farming [IMG]http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i430/clawzownu/farming_zps367451f4.png[/img] Dungeoneering item.title: Rune-Elevation 742 - Bosses, MiniGames, All 25 Skill Working and Much More!
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_Own_U Clawz Own U
item.description:
@Clawz_Own_U wrote:

[CENTER]

[SIZE=5][U][COLOR="#FF0000"]Links:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/U]
Website
Webclient
Download Client
Vote4Spins

[SIZE=5][U][COLOR="#FF0000"]Features:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/U]
[COLOR="#00FF00"]
-100% Shops fixed price and etc.
-Vote4Spins
-100% SOF added (All working Rarities)
-All Dominion Glove Specials Work (Golitath, Spellcasters and Swifts With Shop)
-Full GWD (Including Nex and Nex Drops the new Nex Boots and Gloves!)
-KING BLACK DRAGON JUST LIKE RUNESCAPE (You will love this feature)
-Perfect Theiving, with delay and sides.
-New Saradomin Amulets (Whisper, Murmur and Hiss) and Godwars Items (Bandos helmet, Bandos Gloves, Bandos Boots, Armadyl’s Crossbow, Armadyl’s Buckler
-Ranks: Mod, Admin, Owner, Donator, Extreme Donator and Helper (With all unique crowns!)
-Revenants and Glacors with working Drops (Pvp Armours for Revs) (Glaivens, Steadfasts and Ragefire Boots for Glacors)
-Custom loyalty program with loyalty shop (Every 30 minutes players get a notification in the chat box that they receive 250 Loyalty points.)
-Custom Quest Tab, Skills tele, monster tele, etc.
-All 735+ Monsters such as Nex, Godwars, All of that good stuff
-Home is at Warriors Guild
-Pvp System with Pvp shop
-A completely CUSTOM Ganodermic shop

  • all working auras including supreme’s
  • eco base
  • eco pricing
  • flaming skulls
  • specs for all items the should have
  • Lucky item specs and bonuses
  • Switching is near perfect
  • All Spellbooks are accessible via Commands and altars
  • Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more.
  • Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP
  • Auras are all complete
  • 100% Godwars
  • Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks
  • Frost dragons
  • Dominion Tower
  • Barrows
  • Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless
  • Switching better than RS
  • Full Summoning!!
  • Armour set effects all added!
  • Degrading Pvp Armours
  • Storm Of Armadyl Spell
  • Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar)
  • All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons!
  • Quick Chat 100%
  • music everyone knows that
  • donorzones
  • All new 742 armours with bonuses
  • Bosses are upgraded to new looks
  • Jad waves maxed out to 65
  • Armours are almost all update to date with bonuses and stats
  • Each armour that need requirements on RS is same on here now

[/COLOR]
